## Source: ossf-package-analysis (29adc86f7e8fa93329db6ac34dd5dc8800fa6a3b8f2c4f363934ebf42cf3b88f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'oclips' @ 93.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
